name: Avoid (itch) (Big Stack Of Hay)
description:
Aim of the Game

The aim of the game is to avoid the obstacles and collect coins. By pressing the space bar you can fire bullets which will destroy obstacles, but will not gain you any points. The only way to get points is to collect coins.

Controls

UP ARROW: Move the green square upwards.
DOWN ARROW: Move the green square downwards.
LEFT ARROW: Move the green square left.
RIGHT ARROW: Move the green square right.
SPACE BAR: Fire bullets.

Open Source

Github
This game's source code is available on github.
